nodes.text: The New Jedi Order: Force Heretic III: Reunion (American Foundation for the Blind audiobook)

The New Jedi Order: Force Heretic III: Reunion is the unabridged audiobook version of the Star Wars Legends novel of the same name, by authors Sean Williams and Shane Dix. The audiobook was performed by Martha Harmon Pardee and was released by American Foundation for the Blind in 2006.
